name: Hentai 2+2=4
description: Hentai 2+2=4 - a logical game in which you need to solve mathematical examples and open pictures.

recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7,8,10 Processor: Core i3 or higher Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: 1 GB Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: Any Additional Notes: Use headphones for better experience!
